titleStmt.title: Of the happiness of the saints in heaven a sermon preached before the Queen at Whitehall, October 12, 1690 / by William Beveridge.
Of the happiness of the saints in heaven
titleStmt.author: Beveridge, William, 1637-1708.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bristol Public Library, Bristol, England.
First published in 1690 with title: A sermon preached before the Queen at White-Hall, October 12, 1690.
